As we ponder what redeemed means in our faith walk, we may think of different things. Most of us think of our lives or souls. Others may think of time and situations. Whatever way you ponder the word "redeemed," make sure JESUS is a part of it.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Isaiah 43:1-4
-   Week 2
    -   Psalms 31: 5
-   Week 3
    -   1 Peter 1:18-19
-   Week 4
    -   Galatians 3:13-14
